title: Ticket #4175: Update Globus external to version 5.2.5
description: Globus 5.2.1 is getting a little old, especially with recent changes to OpenSSL and 512-bit x509 keys now deemed too weak. We should update to the latest version.
check_ins:
2014-Jan-23 16:48   Check-in [39227]: Update Globus external from 5.2.1 to 5.2.5. #4175 (By Jaime Frey )
2014-Jan-23 16:48   Check-in [39228]: Remove most globus_libc_* calls in gahp_server. #4175 Most of the globus_libc_* calls now just call the underlying libc functions directly, with no added features. So let's just use the underlying libc functions. (By Jaime Frey )
2014-Jan-23 16:48   Check-in [39229]: New Globus versions allow gt2 gahp to use authentication hack. #4175 We've confirmed that the gt2 gahp's hack to do parallel gsi authentications works with Globus versions up through 5.2.5. (By Jaime Frey )
